description: Max Sargent is heartbroken as he fears his handsome son, Tom, might actually be straight. With his husband out of town, Max finds comfort in the arms of the charming Eli Hunter. Thankfully, he starts to feel more himself as he stuffs Eli’s willing mouth with his thick, fat cock. title: The Straight Man Part 3
